name: Colour Mix
description:
This is my entry for the Summer Slow Jams July 2019: 3-Button, 3-Color Games Game Jam.

It is a fun little game where you have to mix as many colours as you can before the time runs out. click on the 3 palette buttons to mix the colours that you are asked for.

The game is still a work in progess and further colours will be added to increase the difficulty.
